snippet: Twenty-six current and former ballerinas who had worked with the choreographer Jerome Robbins took the stage at New York City Ballet to accept an award named for him.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-six current and former ballerinas who had worked with the choreographer Jerome Robbins took the stage at New York City Ballet to accept an award named for him.

headline.main: Ballet Divas Steal Stage From Riff, if Only Briefly
